Class CommitController

java.lang.Object
Manual.controllers.CommitController
public class CommitController extends Object
Singleton Class that models ToJSON the CRUD Operations of Commit

      public String getCommitByIdJSON​(Long id)

      Parameters:
      id - Long of ID Commit to find
      Returns:
      String of JSON of finded Commit

      Returns:
      String of JSON of inserted Commit

      Returns:
      String of JSON of updated Commit
